title: MCP Workshop July 2025
text:
How LLM Context Works



System Prompt: You are a helpful AI assistant


User: What is machine learning?


AI: Machine learning is a subset of AI that enables computers to learn from dataâ€¦


User: Can you give me a specific example?



AI: Sure! Email spam detection is a common example of machine learningâ€¦





Step 7: AI generates response using full context
